palette.title: enter mr. moon [ME]
palette.description: Where art thou, Mr. Moon? I don't know, but I'm going to find out. smart. Do you know what the word sapiosexual means? It means that you are sexually attraced by intelligence. So in a way zombies and sapiosexual people have one thing in common: they both like brains. Active, healthy, juicy brains. Only difference is, zombies eat them, while us sapiosexuals whorship them with our own... and our own bodies, of course. curious & hard work. There's no way my Mr. Moon is going to be a half-assed guy with no ambition and curiosity whatsoever. experienced. Growing up is stressful, you know. It requires a lot of strength and I don't think I have enough for two people, so right now I'd like my Mr. Moon to help me out with it rather than being as in need as me. good at dancing. So that he would teach me. Not vital, but appreciated.
